# tintColor

**Instance Property**

The tint color to apply to key elements in the search bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var tintColor: UIColor! { get set }
```

## Discussion

In iOS v7.0, all subclasses of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView] derive their behavior for [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/tintColor] from the base class. See the discussion of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/tintColor] at the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView] level for more information.

## Configuring the search bar

- **isEnabled**: A Boolean value indicating whether the search bar is in the enabled state.
- **barTintColor**: The tint color to apply to the search bar background.
- **searchBarStyle**: A search bar style that specifies the search bar’s appearance.
- **UISearchBar.Style**: Specifies whether the search bar has a background.
- **isTranslucent**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the search bar is translucent (true) or not (false).
- **barStyle**: A bar style that specifies the search bar’s appearance.
- **UIBarStyle**: Defines the stylistic appearance of different types of views.
